articles.title: Ukraine crisis: Russia 'planning biggest war in Europe since 1945', PM warns - as loud explosions heard in Donetsk - Sky News
articles.content:
Intelligence suggests Russia is planning "the biggest war in Europe since 1945", Boris Johnson has warned.

articles.author: Jacob Paul
articles.title: EU scrambles to keep up with UK in new wind farm push: 'Need more!' - Daily Express
articles.description: THE EU is scrambling to keep up with the UK's significant progress in offshore wind after the European Parliament demanded that the bloc rapidly scales up the energy source so it can meet climate targets on schedule.

articles.description: The government has called on investors from Europe  to  support the Philippines’ maiden offering of green bonds.
